title: Stream Rihanna’s Savage X Fenty Show Now
text:
The new Savage x Fenty runway show dropped on Amazon Prime Video at midnight Thursday night/Friday morning. The show featured bars by Halsey, Migos, DJ Khaled, Big Sean and A$AP Ferg and bras by Rihanna. All the models came through as well, including the Hadid sisters, Joan Smalls, Cara Delevigne, and Paloma Elsesser. The collection became purchasable on Amazon and the Savage website at the exact same moment the runway show premiered, so lingerie lovers could seamlessly transition from watching to purchasing to wearing. Late capitalism, but make it fashion!

description: Rihanna’s Savage X Fenty show dropped at midnight Thursday night. Models included Gigi and Bella Hadid, Joan Smalls, and Cara Delevigne. Performances included Halsey, A$AP Ferg, and Migos. The collection is available to purchase on Amazon.
